title: Endless patch loop
body: I am stuck in an endless loop where it will say, "we have restored this installation to an older version, Now we will try to patch it." Once I hit okay it says "There was a problem patching, We will restore a backup and try patching again." but every time I click restart in goes back to the attempted patch and so on. How do I fix this? I have restarted my computer and tried running league in admin.

replies.body: Our technicians applied a fix for this earlier today.  Everything should be good now!
You're not alone. This is system wide. Tons of people having this same problem.
